text: @DanPatrick My professor/mentor from @UTAustin is in the high-risk groups and she & her husband just got tested positive for Covid-19 despite being meticulous with wearing masks and other precautions. I'm blaming you & @GregAbbott_TX for your blatant disregard of human life. RESIGN.
